body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Edward Barnes. May I please have your name?

My name is Christine Price and I'm really upset about something.

I'm sorry to hear that, Christine. Please let me know what the issue is and I'll do my best to assist you.

You guys just sent an email with my private information to the wrong person!

I apologize for that, Christine. That certainly shouldn't have happened. Can I please have your email address so I can look into this issue?

It's christine.price@example.com. This kind of mistake is unacceptable!

I understand your frustration, Christine. I will check our records immediately. Could you also provide your contact phone number in case we need to reach you?

It's five five five four two three eight one zero zero.

Thank you for providing that information, Christine. I'll escalate this issue to our privacy team and ensure they address it right away.

Alright, I hope this is resolved quickly.

We will do our best, Christine. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and for your patience. We appreciate your time. Have a good day.
